abstract.text: Performs element-wise addition between two tensors with automatic broadcasting support.
The fundamental base for all arithmetic in the network. It holds a reference to the backpropgation graph as well as the values of the forward pass.
Internally stores data as a flat
with
metadata.
The
computed property provides backward-compatible access as a 3D
array.
Performs element-wise division between two tensors with automatic broadcasting support.
Compares two tensors by storage/shape or identity.
Performs element-wise subtraction along a specific axis with broadcasting support.
